domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text: @realDonaldTrump Many are suffering at this time because a family member is sick or has died from #COVID19. They may be justifiably angry that your selfishness and incompetence joined forces to to delay prepareneess when we knew months ago. Guilt/compassion = emotions foreign to you.
